author: masonjm
msg: - Now dependent on ehcache for caching. This allows objects to expire from the cache and be refreshed on the next request.
- Implements a pre-emptive cache refresh so that long running queries can be refreshed before they expire from the cache.

author: masonjm
msg: Used by JNDIPrincipalStore to get an ehcache CacheManager

author: masonjm
msg: JNDIPrincipleStore is now dependant on ehcache.

author: ozeigermann
msg: Set the display name of the VHR to the name of the resource that gets
versioned to make it a easier to find versions with clients
that do not support DeltaV (like MS Explorer).
